name: Healthyfied Guacamole
description: This Healthyfied Guacamole is a perfect blend of nutrition and taste, making it an ideal choice for those following a low-carb, high-fiber diet. Featuring fresh avocados, red capsicum, and a hint of lemon, it's a delicious way to enjoy a health-conscious version of the classic guacamole, perfect for any healthy recipe collection.
recipeIngredient: 0.50 kg Red capsicum (nutritional info from veggycation)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the red capsicum under cold water, then chop it finely.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the red onion into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, combine the mashed avocado, chopped red capsicum, diced red onion, lemon juice, ground black pepper, and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients until well incorporated. For best flavor, let it sit for about 10 minutes before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
